all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Therefore, he that lacketh wisdom, let him ask of me, and I will give him liberally and upbraid him not.
Doctrine and Covenants 42:68
Quote of the Day
"Our sincere gospel questions can provide Heavenly Father and Jesus Christ with opportunities to help us grow."
Tracy Y. Browning | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
